deck: An official comic book the showcases the assorted artworks used for the 2013 game Dragon's Crown
name: Dragon's Crown Artworks

description: Caleb Green has two things: Mirakuru serum coursing through his veins--and a beef with Oliver Queen! Don't miss the start of Season 2.5's new story arc: "Green"!
name: Green, Part 1: Echo

description: Eitoku Academy has a legacy of being a school for the ultimate elite, the best of the best. And the most rich and powerful students there have formed the Correct 5 clique to maintain the integrity of their school. Unfortunately, new student Oto Edogawa doesn't have the pedigreed background of her peers and has to work part-time jobs to help make ends meet. Will a chance encounter with Haruto Kaguragi, the leader of the Correct 5, put everything at risk?
name: Chapter 1

description: Oto Edogawa discovers a lifeline at Eitoku Academy when she finds out an embarrassing secret about Haruto Kaguragi -- he's chronically addicted to buying muscle-building gadgets and other self-help products. Will this completely change school life for Oto...and for Haruto?
name: Chapter 2

description: Handsome and smart Haruto Kaguragi rules the school, and the world is his oyster...except Oto Edogawa knows an embarrassing secret about him. No problem, he'll just sweep her of her feet and woo her into keeping her mouth shut. But what will happen when things go awry and his plan has the exact opposite effect?
name: Chapter 3

description: Despite Haruto's clumsy best efforts to keep Oto silent by sweeping her off her feet, Oto still hates his guts. But will things change now that he's saved Oto from a creepy stalker?
name: Chapter 4

description: Oto Edogawa is totally confused. Haruto Kaguragi, the leader of the Correct 5, is trying to rid the famed Eitoku Academy of all its poor students. Though she's one of the stealth commoners, her knowledge of Kaguragi's secret is keeping her safe for now. But Kaguragi is sending her mixed signals when he rescues her from a scary co-worker. Is he actually being nice, or is he still plotting something...?
name: Chapter 5

person_credits.name: Colin Upton
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, cover, production

description:
Manga Contents

  • Ore no Sora

Grimm Fairy Tales is one of the best selling and most popular independent comic books on shelves today. Featuring some of the most beautiful and kick-ass female heroines in comics, Grimm Fairy Tales covers have been turning heads for almost a decade! Now the second volume of the Grimm Fairy Tales Art Book hardcover collects the best covers of issues #51 through #100 of the hit series. Includes stunning artwork by some of the industry's top artists such as Neal Adams, Elias Chatzoudis, Sean Chen, Anthony Spay, Jamie Tyndall, and many more!

name: Volume Two

description:
The third and final volume in Dynamite Entertainment's Red Sonja Art Edition line dedicated to fantasy illustration's shining star, Frank Thorne! The defining She-Devil artist shares his original storyboards from the issue #7 through #11 of the acclaimed 1970s Red Sonja comic book series. Scanned in high-resolution color and printed at original size, this gorgeous hardcover collection preserves every detail of the artist's meticulous skill and hard work, while simultaneously presenting a complete storyline for all to enjoy.

Note: The digital edition (4/8/2015) for this volume was released before the print edition.
name: Volume 3

volume.name: Frank Thorne's Red Sonja Art Edition

description: Bigby has the scent and his nose leads him to a suspiciously sealed door at the Open Arms Hotel.
name: Chapter Nineteen

description:
By the New York Times bestselling author of Girl Friends comes an all-new yuri manga

As a child, Sasami Aoba fantasized about becoming a defender of justice, like the magical girls and "Sentai Rangers" she admired on TV. Years have passed and now Sasami has become a police officer herself. Her first assignment is to infiltrate Hanagaki All-Girls High School and ferret out any trouble she may find.

On her first day posing as a student, Sasami is shocked to discover that an apparent book thief at school is actually another undercover police officer, Sakuraba Midori. What's more, Midori insists that she herself is the officer in charge of the school, not Sasami. Will the two girls become rivals, partners...or something more?

Back Blurb

Stop! In the Name of Love!

Since she was a child, Aoba has had only one dream: to fight evil and protect the weak. To achieve this dream, Aoba became a polizi, a teenaged undercover cop stationed at all-girls Hanagaki High. While Aoba will go to any length to solve a crime, her no-nonsense, by-the-book partner Midori constantly tries to reign her in. Just as this odd couple is starting to get along, Midori's former partner, Akari, shows up. Akari seems to have her own agenda at the school, and even worse, is determined to steal Midori away! Will this mysterious newcomer break up their partnership before Aoba gets the chance to tell Midori how she really feels?

Chapter 8 - 16 (Final Chapter).
name: Vol. 2

description:
The zombie survival genre has just met its match!

High-schooler Kii Kogami is stuck in a rut, loathing the monotonous doldrums of his everyday life. If only something exciting were to happen, something magical. As fate would have it, Kii is about to get his wish, but in a way more terrifying than anything he could have imagined.

When a little girl clad in gothic lolita attire appears at school and starts to gruesomely bludgeon, dismember, and mutilate all who cross her path, while chanting the mantra "Magical Girl" under her breath, the school devolves into a state of bloody chaos.

Just how will Kii escape from this murderous magical girl? To make matters worse, the magical girl's victims reanimate and join her killer rampage. Is there no way out of school for hapless Kii Kogami? And even if he escapes, what will be left of the world outside?

Back Blurb

Magical Girls of Future Past

Kogami Kii's life has been a living nightmare, as Tokyo is devastated by the savage attack of the magical girls. Yet all this fades away as Kii and friends suddenly awaken in a peaceful world--ten years in the past! Out of place and time, Kii and his companions struggle to adjust to a seemingly ordinary, everyday life, while wondering why they were sent to the past in the first place, and if they're stuck there permanently.

Contents

  • 009.Stigma
  • 010.LOST REASON
  • 011.time will tell
  • 012.only today
  • Magical Girl Apocalypse ~P.O.V.~ 03
name: Volume 3

description:
The Perfect Edition

Schwald, the most influential person in the state of Bayern, now trusts Johan fully and makes him his right-hand man. Johan could be setting himself up as the wonder boy of the German financial world.

Meanwhile, a private detective working for Schwald investigates the mysterious events happening around the man and senses something massive and evil lurking behind it all. His investigation pits him against a terrible monsterâ€”are Johanâ€™s plans going to come to light?

Although Johan knows that Tenma wants to kill him, he pursues a quiet life. But what does he see in a childrenâ€™s book that suddenly causes him to burst into tears?
name: Volume 4

description:
My Neighbor Seki is a collection of short stories that revolve around two classmates who sit at the back of their high school homeroom. In each chapter Seki devises a new way to kill time in his school desk, to best avoid boredom. And along the way, he ends up distracting the girl who sits next to him Rumi; who's mind goes wild as Seki pushes the limits of his disobediance.

Contains 16th Period - 28th Period & two Bonus stories.
name: Imaginative Friends

description:
This brochure is published by the Dutch council for the judiciary, communications department. Besides the comic strip there's a lot of information about the Dutch court system and the law.

This promotional comic is available in hard and digital copy and can be ordered by schools/teachers. The comic is also available at the information stand at a Dutch court for free and can be downloaded for free through this link.

There's no information inside the comic about the creators.
name: Over rechtspraak in Nederland

description:
As Telos, the Planet Incarnate, easily defeats the survivors of Earth 2, Thomas Wayne and Dick Grayson set off to find help in the pre-Flashpoint Gotham City. The emotional implication of these worlds colliding comes crashing down when Thomas Wayne confronts this worldâ€™s Batman, as father meets son!

Plus, Alan Scottâ€™s attempts to connect with The Green yield unexpected results, setting our team on a quest to escape the planet. And the cyborgs of Futures End engage in a battle to the death against the reimagined heroes of the Just Imagine Universe, while the city of Superman Red and Blue takes on the opposing forces from GENERATIONS!

description:
STARRING HEROES FROM ZERO HOUR! Ted Kord, Martian Manhunter, Fire and Ice star as the levity of the JLI team collides with the severity of the world of Kingdom Come!

Note: Some characters appear in the backmatter recap only

The depowered Justice League International, consisting of Fire, Ice, Captain Atom, Red Tornado, Martian Manhunter, and Ted Kord, are dropped under the doom in Metropolis when Metallo attacks. Ted is able to his tech to stop Metallo but Aldos Cafe is destroyed and its owner gives Ted an earfull.

This bothers Ted and after a quick team meeting, he resigns himself to fixing the Bug, and that is where Martain Manhunter finds him. Manhunter tries to pick up Ted's spirts but his attempt is interrupted by Telos's message.

Telos's messages is that the heroes of each city would have to do battle. Ted realizes his team would have to battle another team. This is when Wonder Woman, Shazam, Obsidian, Nightshade, Jade, Huntress, Creeper and Future Blue Beetle, shows up. Ted then declared war on Wonder Woman and her team.

Backup: History of the Justice League International.

HEâ€™S IN RIVERDALE WITH A FEW DAYS TO KILL!

What mysterious attraction does the gang hold for the trophy-collecting Predator, and will the kids even realize theyâ€™re in danger before it claims them all?

The wildest Archie crossover ever (and thatâ€™s saying something)!

description:
YOU HAVE THE POWER!

In 1982, the world was introduced to He-Man and the Masters of the Universe. What followed was a cultural sensation that changed the landscape of childrenâ€™s entertainment forever! Join Mattel and Dark Horse in this comprehensive retrospective chronicling He-Manâ€™s decades-long, epic journey from toy, to television, to film, to a true pop culture phenomenon!

Includes rarely seen images of concept sketches, prototypes, restored art from master illustrator Earl Norem, and more from Mattelâ€™s archives!

Features interviews with Dolph Lundgren, Paul Dini, Erika Scheimer, and many more!

description:
Eisner, Harvey, and Stumptown Award winner!

Sergio AragonÃ©sâ€™s Groo gets involved in politics, and thatâ€™s not good for man, woman, or child in the final chapter of â€œThe Kids Who Would Be Kingsâ€! Plus, Victor Santosâ€™s spymaster Black Kaiser, from Polar: Came from the Cold, joins an espionage team set to infiltrate a dangerous organization . . . but can he trust them? Who will betray them?

Make sure to look out for Polar: Eye for an Eye, the second spy-noir collection of Santosâ€™s celebrated web comic, in stores this month!

New chapters of Fred Van Lente and Guiu Vilanovaâ€™s Greene, Alex de Campi and Jerry Ordwayâ€™s Semiautomagic, Brendan McCarthyâ€™s Dream Gang, and Mike Grellâ€™s Tarzan!
